title: Renovated colonial villa close to talpe beach for sale
details:
Recently renovated colonial villa just 5 minutes inland from the exclusive white sandy beaches of Talpe.

The villa offers 4 air conditioned bedrooms all with en-suites, and the villa utilises solar water heating.

The gardens are well landscaped and there is ample space for a pool if so desired.

There is separate staff accommodation, mains water is connected to the property.

This is a perfect family retreat in a quiet location just a short distance to the beach.
